titleStmt.title: Holy rules and helps to devotion both in prayer and practice In two parts. The fourth edition. Written by the right reverend father in God, Bryan Duppa, late Lord Bishop of Winton, in the time of his sequestration.
titleStmt.author: Duppa, Brian, 1588-1662.

titleStmt.title: Holy rules and helps to devotion both in prayer and practice In two parts. The fourth edition. Written by the right reverend father in God, Bryan Duppa, late Lord Bishop of Winton, in the time of his sequestration.
titleStmt.author: Duppa, Brian, 1588-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Hensman, at the King's-Head in Westminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Running title: Holy rules for devotion.
The second part has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Identified as Wing (2nd ed., 1994) D2663 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 2125.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
